video-analysis.chat.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you with video analysis today?
video-analysis.text.coming-soon: Our AI-powered video analysis is coming soon.
video-analysis.text.value-prop-part1: It will help analyze therapy session recordings
video-analysis.text.value-prop-part2: , detect key themes, nonverbal cues, and therapeutic dynamics — all with full end-to-end security.
video-analysis.text.security: Your video data is protected at every step: in your browser, during upload, and throughout the AI-based processing.
video-analysis.text.in-development: This feature is currently in development —
video-analysis.chat.title: Video Analysis
